hero_tagline: A Framework for Scalable, Open, and Event-Driven Industry
hero_desc: A Unified Namespace (UNS) is a living, event-driven, structured data ecosystem that creates a (near) real-time, shared, contextualized understanding of operations.
hero_framework: It is a framework â€” not a tool.
hero_tools: Tools may enable it. But tools alone will never make it. It is human centered, and needs governance.
contact_subtitle: This site is public and Open Source.
footer_license: #UNSManifesto is Open Sourced with the free license
sign_intro: Join the movement for open, interoperable, and scalable industrial systems. Sign as an individual or on behalf of your company.
gdpr_intro_title: Your Data is Safe With Us
gdpr_intro: Under GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) guidelines, we assure you that your information will not be sold. Your data is displayed on our Open Source project for transparency and community building purposes only.
gdpr_rights_intro: You have full control over your personal data. You can:
gdpr_right_access: Access your data at any time
gdpr_right_modify: Modify your information if it's incorrect
gdpr_right_export: Export your data in a portable format
gdpr_data_optional: When you sign the manifesto, we collect the following optional information:
gdpr_purpose: Your optional responses help the community understand which countries and companies are leading the way in adopting the Unified Namespace architecture for Industry 4.0.
gdpr_contact_text: To access, modify, or delete your information, please contact us:
gdpr_response_time: We will respond to your request within 30 days as required by GDPR regulations.
